# OSCP Scripts

This script can be used in different ways, the best way is using the base64 oneliner:

```bash
echo -n "" | base64 -d | bash
```

Or downloading the file from your machine to the victim.

You can also add the password of the user as an argument

```bash
./emanlui.sh PASS
```


## NMAP

This will create 3 files: scan, vulns and ports

```bash
./nmap.sh IP
```
